options.content:
Display's all clusters for enabled or configured connectors , connector instance can be filtered using the cluster name and connector instance filter combination
Note: if any cluster is not installed/enabled a default row is shown with empty panels and no data

panels.description:
The lag between update of a record in Aerospike and it reaching the Connector. Output in milliseconds. Calculated as aerospike_record.lut - current_time. It's sampled every second based on the XDR record being processed at that time, it is approximate and not exact.
Reference: https://docs.aerospike.com/connect/streaming/management-api
panels.title: Connector Lag
